### Python ###
# Byte-compiled files
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class

# Virtual environments
myenv/
.env/
venv/
.venv/
env/
ENV/

# Logs and databases
*.log
*.sqlite

### Data ###
# Ignore data files
/data/
*.csv
*.tsv
*.xlsx
*.json
*.hdf5
*.feather
*.parquet

### Models ###
# Trained models and serialized objects
*.pkl
*.pickle
*.joblib
*.pt
*.pth
*.h5
*.model

### Jupyter ###
# Notebook checkpoints
.ipynb_checkpoints/

### IDE ###
# VS Code
.vscode/
.idea/

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db
Desktop.ini

### Build/Deployment ###
# Distribution / packaging
.eggs/
*.egg-info/
*.egg
build/
dist/
*.so
*.exe
*.dll

# Installer logs
pip-log.txt
pip-delete-this-directory.txt

# Unit test / coverage reports
htmlcov/
.tox/
.nox/
.coverage
.coverage.*
.cache
nosetests.xml
coverage.xml
*.cover
